name: Akki Avalanchers
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Akki Avalanchers gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Among Godo's hordes, "beware of falling rocks" came to mean "akki live nearby."

name: Akki Rockspeaker
oracle_text: When Akki Rockspeaker enters the battlefield, add {R}.
flavor_text: The lava-proof shells of akki evolved over centuries, as akki pranks almost always got seriously out of hand.

name: Ashen-Skin Zubera
oracle_text: When Ashen-Skin Zubera dies, target opponent discards a card for each Zubera that died this turn.
flavor_text: When the Honden of Night's Reach began to crumble, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to haunt mortal dreams.

name: Battle-Mad Ronin
oracle_text:
Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)
Battle-Mad Ronin attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: "I fought fiercely, bravely, and without mercy. Had I not struck down my captain in the heat of battle, I might have become a hero instead of an outcast."

name: Befoul
oracle_text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"When the rampaging kami at Reito had crushed the opposing militia, swarms of minor kami swept over the battlefield to consume all that remained."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

name: Blessed Breath
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Brutal Deceiver
oracle_text:
{1}: Look at the top card of your library.
{2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Brutal Deceiver gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

name: Burr Grafter
oracle_text:
Sacrifice Burr Grafter: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Cage of Hands
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{1}{W}: Return Cage of Hands to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Our own actions built the prisons that now hold us. Our hands reached too far and tried to hold too much."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Callous Deceiver
oracle_text:
{1}: Look at the top card of your library.
{2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Callous Deceiver gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

name: Call to Glory
oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control. Samurai creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"General Takeno glared at us as if we were the enemy. 'The day is not over yet,' he shouted, 'and unless you have a nezumi's heart, you *will* stand and fight!'"
—*Battle of Akagi River: A Survivor's Tale*

name: Commune with Nature
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Consuming Vortex
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Counsel of the Soratami
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "Wisdom is not the counting of all the drops in a waterfall. Wisdom is learning why the water seeks the earth."

name: Cruel Deceiver
oracle_text:
{1}: Look at the top card of your library.
{2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Cruel Deceiver gains "Whenever Cruel Deceiver deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature" until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

name: Crushing Pain
oracle_text: Crushing Pain deals 6 damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: It is said that the mere touch of a kami is like embracing the sun itself.

name: Cursed Ronin
oracle_text:
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{B}: Cursed Ronin gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You are fortunate, my enemy. You have paid the price but once. I never stop paying."

name: Deathcurse Ogre
oracle_text: When Deathcurse Ogre dies, each player loses 3 life.
flavor_text: After their worship of oni began, only a few of Kamigawa's ogres remained in the bitter cold of the Tendo Peaks. Most were drawn to the darkness of Takenuma.

name: Desperate Ritual
oracle_text:
Add {R}{R}{R}.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Devoted Retainer
oracle_text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Deep within Eiganjo Castle lay the Palace of Infinite Halls, a seemingly endless network of corridors once guarded by a seemingly endless legion of samurai.

name: Devouring Greed
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of Spirits.
Target player loses 2 life plus 2 life for each Spirit sacrificed this way. You gain that much life.

name: Devouring Rage
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of Spirits.
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. For each Spirit sacrificed this way, that creature gets an additional +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Distress
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"Today I asked Master Dosan what the ogre mages did with the humans they sacrificed. He gave me a hard look and said to think no more on the matter."
—Meditation journal of young budoka

name: Dripping-Tongue Zubera
oracle_text: When Dripping-Tongue Zubera dies, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each Zubera that died this turn.
flavor_text: When the Honden of Life's Web was destroyed, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to ensure mortal defeat.

name: Ember-Fist Zubera
oracle_text: When Ember-Fist Zubera dies, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of Zubera that died this turn.
flavor_text: When the Honden of Infinite Rage shattered, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to sow mortal destruction.

name: Ethereal Haze
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn.
flavor_text:
"Imagine a dove flying through smoke. Does the dove injure the smoke? Does the smoke impede the dove?"
—Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

name: Eye of Nowhere
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Once we prayed to the kaijin for safe voyage. Now we only pray that we can escape their gaze."
—Hayato, master sailor

name: Feral Deceiver
oracle_text:
{1}: Look at the top card of your library.
{2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Feral Deceiver gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

name: Field of Reality
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by Spirits.
{1}{U}: Return Field of Reality to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"The scholars of the Minamo School understood the veil between their world and that of the kami. Moreover, they knew how to exploit it."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Floating-Dream Zubera
oracle_text: When Floating-Dream Zubera dies, draw a card for each Zubera that died this turn.
flavor_text: When the Honden of Seeing Winds was forgotten, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to uncover mortal secrets.

name: Frostwielder
oracle_text:
If a creature dealt damage by Frostwielder this turn would die, exile it instead.
{T}: Frostwielder deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Gibbering Kami
oracle_text:
Flying
Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Glacial Ray
oracle_text:
Glacial Ray deals 2 damage to any target.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Harsh Deceiver
oracle_text:
{1}: Look at the top card of your library.
{2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, untap Harsh Deceiver and it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

name: Hearth Kami
oracle_text: {X}, Sacrifice Hearth Kami: Destroy target artifact with mana value X.
flavor_text:
"Every treachery, great or small, begets a spirit that rages at the injustice. Given the opportunity, each will return that treachery to its owner tenfold."
—Sensei Hisoka

name: Hisoka's Defiance
oracle_text: Counter target Spirit or Arcane spell.
flavor_text: "With every passing day, the kami shape our world to suit their will. I, for one, would not see them succeed."

name: Hisoka's Guard
oracle_text:
You may choose not to untap Hisoka's Guard during your untap step.
{1}{U}, {T}: Target creature you control other than Hisoka's Guard has shroud for as long as Hisoka's Guard remains tapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

name: Humble Budoka
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: Each time wanderers entered the forest seeking enlightenment, Dosan was there, waiting for them to arrive.

name: Hundred-Talon Kami
oracle_text:
Flying
Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Indomitable Will
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor_text:
"None of you are yet samurai. Defend your homes with honor, die for your cause, and perhaps then you will be worthy of the word."
—General Takeno

name: Joyous Respite
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.
flavor_text:
"I have been gifted by the kami with long life. So far, they have not seen fit to withdraw their gift. There may yet be a way to stop the killing without more blood, human or kami, being spilled."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Jukai Messenger
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Dosan's monks, deep in spiritual thought, could walk through the thickest of forests without leaving a mark, even the leaves beneath their feet unaffected by their passing.

name: Kabuto Moth
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Many great warriors died in the first days of the war, as the spirits of their weaponry turned against them with terrifying rage."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Kami of Ancient Law
oracle_text: Sacrifice Kami of Ancient Law: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Duty and law are the foundation on which civilization stands. They must not fall, for when they do, they take everything with them."
—Lord Konda

name: Kami of Fire's Roar
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"I can hear the shamans chanting in the hills. They say their magic will protect us from the kami, that our gold has bought our safety. But no one sleeps soundly tonight."
—Scroll fragment from the ruins of Reito

name: Kami of the Hunt
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Kami of the Hunt gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry, Jiro. The kami would never attack us this close to home . . . . Jiro?"
—Hoto, temple guardian, last words

name: Kami of the Painted Road
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Kami of the Painted Road gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: In ancient times, precepts of kami law were inscribed onto bridges as a gesture of respect. During the war, humans regarded them as warnings of where not to travel.

name: Kami of the Waning Moon
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text:
"For a moment, Reito's defenders regrouped. Then wailing kami reappeared to send them scattering like flocks of frightened birds."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

name: Kami of Twisted Reflection
oracle_text: Sacrifice Kami of Twisted Reflection: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Its form reflected humanity as it stood during the Kami War: disjointed, confused, and incomplete.

name: Kashi-Tribe Warriors
oracle_text: Whenever Kashi-Tribe Warriors deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: The orochi and the monks had always had an unspoken agreement: live and let live. But when the kami began raging, some warrior youths began questioning that agreement.

name: Kitsune Blademaster
oracle_text:
First strike
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Those kitsune trained in the blade preferred to fight with a blade-catching jitte in the off hand, buying them just enough time to deliver the first deadly cut.

name: Kitsune Diviner
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target Spirit.
flavor_text: She who once led prayers honoring the kami adapted to use her influence to stay them.

name: Kitsune Healer
oracle_text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
{T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target legendary creature this turn.

name: Kitsune Riftwalker
oracle_text: Protection from Spirits and from Arcane
flavor_text: The wake of his passage shoved aside the influence of the kami.

name: Kodama's Might
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {G} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Kodama's Reach
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"The land grows only where the kami will it."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Lantern Kami
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Snuffing the light of a lantern without saying a small prayer is bad luck. Though its flame can only singe, its soul can repeatedly visit misery on one's house."
—Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

name: Lava Spike
oracle_text: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

name: Lifted by Clouds
oracle_text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Matsu-Tribe Decoy
oracle_text:
{2}{G}: Target creature blocks Matsu-Tribe Decoy this turn if able.
Whenever Matsu-Tribe Decoy deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Midnight Covenant
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor_text:
"Not all mortals fought the kami. The ogres revered the oni, while some humans made pacts based upon empty promises."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Moss Kami
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: Kami manifest in the form of whatever they embody in the physical plane. Some tower in the shape of moss or bark, while others take forms beyond mortal imagining.

name: Mothrider Samurai
oracle_text:
Flying
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: When the night blossoms open, the wings of Eiganjo take flight.

name: Mystic Restraints
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Mystic Restraints enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Nezumi Cutthroat
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Nezumi Cutthroat can't block.
flavor_text:
"These nezumi, they disgust me. The things they will do for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

name: Nezumi Ronin
oracle_text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Some nezumi became as skilled in the samurai arts as the humans and kitsune. Yet no lord would have them, so they sold their swords to the highest bidder."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Order of the Sacred Bell
flavor_text: "Our bodies are weak compared to those of the kami, our knowledge limited, and our magic poor. Yet we draw breath. That alone is reason to hope."

name: Orochi Leafcaller
oracle_text: {G}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "Only orochi hatched from eggs 'touched by the kami' may become shamans. These days, there are fewer and fewer new shamans being born."

name: Orochi Ranger
oracle_text: Whenever Orochi Ranger deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"The young come to me, confused. They have been taught to respect the kami, and now they must fight them? I do not know what to say."
—Sachi, to her father

name: Orochi Sustainer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "Nothing is the same anymore. The forests are not as lush, the waters not as pure, the air not as clear. Without the kami to direct and sustain the forces of nature, it's only a matter of time before we feel their neglect."

name: Peer Through Depths
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Pious Kitsune
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a devotion counter on Pious Kitsune. Then if a creature named Eight-and-a-Half-Tails is on the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each devotion counter on Pious Kitsune.
{T}, Remove a devotion counter from Pious Kitsune: You gain 1 life.

name: Psychic Puppetry
oracle_text:
You may tap or untap target permanent.
Splice onto Arcane {U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Pull Under
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Although nowhere on Kamigawa was safe during the war, the Takenuma Swamp was the most horrifying. The rotting bamboo itself rebelled against its mortal inhabitants, pulling them into unmarked graves."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Quiet Purity
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"When the Kami of Utter Silence passes, walls lose their secrets. Scrolls lose their lessons. Tapestries lose their beauty. Where there was meaning, there is only stillness."
—Sensei Hisoka

name: Rag Dealer
oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor_text:
"After General Takeno found the Oathkeeper amidst the bamboo marshes, more scavengers braved the swamp's nezumi, oni, and kami in hopes of glory."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Ragged Veins
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, its controller loses that much life.

name: Reach Through Mists
oracle_text: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Know one part of the name, obsession begins. Know two parts, paranoia sets in. Know three parts, madness descends. Know all, and only the kami know what will become of you."
—Lady Azami

name: Rend Flesh
oracle_text: Destroy target non-Spirit creature.
flavor_text:
"The Reito Massacre was a testament to the kami's unstoppable power. The human defenders might as well have been moths battling a forest fire."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

name: Rend Spirit
oracle_text: Destroy target Spirit.
flavor_text:
"The battle at Ganzan Pass was a testament to human endurance. The untrained and frightened group escaped three legions of kami, leaving more than their share of slain foes in their wake."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

name: River Kaijin
flavor_text:
"Since the war began, fishermen don't sing to the kaijin to ask for full nets. They guard the shore with thrice-blessed spears, saving the nets for their wives to pack their belongings and leave."
—Hayato, master sailor

name: Ronin Houndmaster
oracle_text:
Haste
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Some samurai fell so far out of grace that only dogs would keep them company.

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
oracle_text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

name: Scuttling Death
oracle_text:
Sacrifice Scuttling Death: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature

{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

name: Silent-Chant Zubera
oracle_text: When Silent-Chant Zubera dies, you gain 2 life for each Zubera that died this turn.
flavor_text: When the Honden of Cleansing Fire was abandoned, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to erode mortal will.

name: Sokenzan Bruiser
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text:
"We camped near the Sokenzan Mountains. Though I know its inhabitants are sparse, I hear cries coming from the highest peaks every night, as if the mountains themselves bellow for vengeance."
—Lost Battalion, message to General Takeno

name: Soratami Cloudskater
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: "You hide your actions from eyes on the ground, but nothing escapes the clouds."

Flying

name: Soul of Magma
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Soul of Magma deals 1 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"In every other mind, the battle was lost. General Takeno alone was not touched by despair. Drawing his blade, he was attack and rallying cry in one."
—*Battle of Akagi River: A Survivor's Tale*

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"The kami struck with gouts of fire, showers of rock, and the combined rage of the spirit world. Only Eiganjo Castle remained standing, glistening untouched in the sun."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Teller of Tales
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may tap or untap target creature.
flavor_text: Words never uttered by mortals flowed incessantly from its many mouths.

name: Terashi's Cry
oracle_text: Tap up to three target creatures.
flavor_text:
"The sun kami is terrible to behold. When its temper flares, best seek shade and pray for forgiveness."
—Sensei Golden-Tail

name: Thoughtbind
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or less.
flavor_text:
"As the rest of the mortal world waged war, Lady Azami and her students invaded tomes of knowledge. Their search yielded spells critical in the fight."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Uncontrollable Anger
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: To an akki warrior, gravity is the direction of the nearest unsmashed face.

name: Unearthly Blizzard
oracle_text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"We are trapped. The mountains and blinding kami storms have made us hopelessly lost. We are starving. In the name of all things sacred, please, send help . . . ."
—Lost Battalion, final message to General Takeno

name: Unnatural Speed
oracle_text: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"How can we hope to match the speed of lightning? The fury of storms? The power of mountains? The answer is simple. We cannot. I advise against this war."
—Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

name: Venerable Kumo
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Vigilance
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
flavor_text:
"Put a spear in a peasant's hands, and you have an expendable troop. Put a purpose in his heart, and you win a warrior."
—Sensei Golden-Tail

name: Villainous Ogre
oracle_text:
Villainous Ogre can't block.
As long as you control a Demon, Villainous Ogre has "{B}: Regenerate Villainous Ogre."
flavor_text:
"The war saw the ogres emerge from their caves, reeking of blood, with the power of oni in their veins."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Vine Kami
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Soulshift 6 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Waking Nightmare
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"Once each year, the oni and other evil spirits paraded through villages to disturb mortals' sleep. During the war, this parade became a nightly event."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Wandering Ones
flavor_text:
"I saw them once, when I was a child. They led me to my parents' arms when I was lost. Why have they abandoned me now? Why won't they take me home again?"
—Unnamed beggar

name: Wear Away
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{G} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Wicked Akuba
oracle_text: {B}: Target player dealt damage by Wicked Akuba this turn loses 1 life.
flavor_text: The sound of children weeping is a song that fills its heart with joy.

name: Yamabushi's Flame

name: Yamabushi's Storm
